short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 一个帮助用户在访问链接前验证URL的安全工具
short.en: A security tool to help users verify URLs before visiting them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
🌟 功能特点
🛡️ 拦截所有网页请求以增强安全性
⚡ 轻量级且性能快速
🔒 三重确认系统防止意外点击
👀 每个确认步骤都有清晰的视觉反馈
🌐 适用于所有网站
🎨 简洁直观的用户界面

🚀 使用方法
点击任意网页上的链接
将出现确认对话框
点击确认按钮三次
点击"访问网站"按钮前往目标网站
long.en:
🌟 Features
🛡️ Intercepts all webpage requests for enhanced security
⚡ Lightweight and fast performance
🔒 Triple confirmation system to prevent accidental clicks
👀 Clear visual feedback for each confirmation step
🌐 Works on all websites
🎨 Clean and intuitive user interface

🚀 Usage
Click any link on any webpage
A confirmation dialog will appear
Click the confirmation button three times
Click the "Visit Website" button to proceed to your destination
